mapper.select: select distinct operate_year from b_book_operate group by operate_year

select t2.dict_name as name, ifnull(t1.num, 0) as value from ( select wr.category, count(1)as num from b_book as wr group by wr.category ) as t1 RIGHT JOIN (select * from sys_dict where dict_level = 'book_category' and parent_id !=-1) as t2 on t1.category = t2.dict_value ORDER BY value DESC

SELECT t2.name, t1.operate_count as value FROM ( SELECT book_id, COUNT(book_id) AS operate_count FROM b_book_operate_detail GROUP BY book_id ORDER BY COUNT(book_id) ASC ) AS t1 LEFT JOIN b_book AS t2 ON t1.book_id = t2.id
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CONCAT(YEAR(up_date),'-',LPAD(MONTH(up_date), 2, 0)) AS name, COUNT(1) AS value FROM b_book GROUP BY YEAR(up_date), MONTH(up_date) ) AS t1 ORDER BY t1.name DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CONCAT(YEAR(down_date),'-',LPAD(MONTH(down_date), 2, 0)) AS name, COUNT(1) AS value FROM b_book WHERE down_date is not null GROUP BY YEAR(down_date), MONTH(down_date) ) AS t1 ORDER BY t1.name DESC
